ygData.subject: Re: New term for "Twisting"
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I don t mean to seem non-democratic, but I m always going to refer to it as juggling , since that is what I ve always called it, and what it really
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I don't mean to seem non-democratic, but I'm always going to refer to
it as "juggling", since that is what I've always called it, and what it
really feels like I'm doing while playing.

Of course, feel free to call it whatever works for you.

On a side note: When I wrote the player's guide for bards on EQVault, I put
in a section called "The Art of Juggling", hoping the term would catch on
and replace the only other term I had heard, which was "twisting".
Apparently it didn't work. :)

Jyzan
